name: Galanthus
description:
Special for 2020 Unreal Spring Jam
"What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw"

Сontrols - 
V - to activate scanner and UI
WASD - movment 
SPACEBAR - Jump
E - activate item or pick up item
H - heal
!!!Press SPACEBAR second time after jump withholding W to get air boost in direction you looking at!!!


List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission. -

QUIXEL megascans - Skated_Frozen_Lake_3x3_M_00 | Fresh_Windswept_Snow_2x2_M_00
Epic Games - standart audio files in UE4. First peeson template animation.


2 minute gameplay

60 seconds gameplay
